contextId.occurrenceNote: The command in the first sentence functions as a hypothetical condition. Alternate translation: "If you present that to your governor, will he accept you or will he lift up your face?" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-imperative]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hypo]])
contextId.glQuote: Present that to your governor! Will he accept you or will he lift up your face?
